text: Eves on Skis is a 1963 British naturist documentary from Edward Craven Walker. It was not a success at the box office.Simon Sheridan, Keeping the British End Up: Four Decades of Saucy Cinema, Titan Books 2011 p 48 ==References== ==External links== *Eves on Skis at IMDb Category:British films Category:British documentary films
title: Eves on Skis
